span.span: Describes a ClickOnce or native Win32 application manifest.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定应用程序是否承载于浏览器中（例如，WPF Web 浏览器应用程序就承载于浏览器中）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the application is hosted in a browser (as WPF Web Browser Applications are).

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否在浏览器中承载要部署的应用程序。如果是，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the application being deployed will be hosted in a browser (), or not ().

value.span: 值仅适用于 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序。

span.span: applies only to WPF Web Browser Applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序以外的项目类型，应设置到`False`（默认值）。For project types other than WPF Web Browser Applications, you should set to `False` (the default value). 部署 WPF Web 浏览器应用程序时，必须设置属性设置为`True`。When you deploy a WPF Web Browser Application, you must set the property to `True`. 这将导致``标记添加到生成的应用程序清单。This causes the `` tag to be added to the generated application manifest. 此标记使 ClickOnce 部署浏览器托管应用程序，其中包含.xbap 文件的项目。This tag enables ClickOnce to deploy projects for browser-hosted applications, which contain .xbap files. 您还需要提供应用程序只能联机通过设置到`False`。You will also have to make the application available only online by setting to `False`. 如果不这样做，则会收到[MSBuild 错误 MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e)。If you do not do this, you will receive [MSBuild Error MSB3116](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bf04c587-d0e2-4d68-bbff-da9a985ea70e).

summary.span: 获取或设置程序图标文件。

span.span: Gets or sets the program icon file.

value.span: 表示图标文件名称的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the name of the icon file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 程序图标表示生成的应用程序清单中，并用于**启动**菜单并**添加或删除程序**。The program icon is expressed in the generated application manifest and is used for the **Start** menu and **Add or Remove Programs**. 如果此图标文件未指定，则使用默认图标。If this the icon file is not specified, a default icon is used. 对于本机 Win32 清单，将忽略此输入。For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指定该清单是一个 ClickOnce 应用程序清单还是本机 Win32 应用程序清单。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the manifest is a ClickOnce application manifest or a native Win32 application manifest.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示清单是 ClickOnce 应用程序清单 () 还是本机 Win32 清单 ()。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the manifest is a ClickOnce application manifest () or a native Win32 manifest ().

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 ClickOnce 应用程序部署中允许的最大文件路径长度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum allowed length of a file path in a ClickOnce application deployment.

summary.span: 如果指定此值，则将针对此限制检查应用程序中每个文件路径的长度。

span.span: If this value is specified, the length of each file path in the application is checked against this limit.

summary.span: 超出该限制的任何项都会导致一条警告消息。

span.span: Any items that exceed the limit cause a warning message.

summary.span: 如果此输入未指定或为零，则不会执行任何检查。

span.span: If this input is not specified or is zero, no checking is performed.

summary.span: 对于本机 Win32 清单，将忽略此输入。

span.span: For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.

value.span: 一个整数，它指示 ClickOnce 应用程序部署中允许的最大文件路径长度。

span.span: An integer that indicates the maximum allowed length of a file path in a ClickOnce application deployment.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ OSVersion { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.OSVersion : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定应用程序所需的最低操作系统版本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the minimum required operating system version required by the application.

value.span: 表示应用程序所需最低操作系统版本的字符串。

span.span: A string that indicates the minimum required operating system version required by the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定应用程序所需的最低操作系统版本。Specifies the minimum operating system version required by the application. 一个示例值是"5.1.2600.0"适用于 Windows XP。An example value is "5.1.2600.0" for Windows XP. 如果未指定此输入，使用默认值。If this input is not specified, a default value is used. 默认值为所需的最低支持的操作系统的.NET Framework 中，这是为 Windows 98SE"4.10.0.0"。The default value is the minimum supported operating system of the .NET Framework, which is "4.10.0.0" for Windows 98SE. 但是，如果应用程序包含的任何本机或 Reg-free COM 引用，默认值为 Windows XP。However, if the application contains any native or Reg-Free COM references, the default is Windows XP. 对于本机 Win32 清单，将忽略此输入。For a native Win32 manifest, this input is ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Product { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Product : string with get, set

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定项目文件中的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the property in the project file.

value.span: 与项目文件中 属性相对应的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于`ProductName`项目文件中的属性。This property corresponds to the `ProductName` property in the project file. 默认值为 null。The default is null. 如果`ProductName`为 null，是`True`，注册表中的 RegisteredOrganization 值写入到应用程序清单。If `ProductName` is null and is `True`, the RegisteredOrganization value in the registry is written to the application manifest. 如果 RegisteredOrganization 也为 null，则使用程序集名称。If RegisteredOrganization is also null, the assembly name is used.

set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定项目文件中的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the property in the project file.

value.span: 与项目文件中 属性相对应的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于`PublisherName`项目文件中的属性。This property corresponds to the `PublisherName` property in the project file. 默认值为 null。The default is null. 如果`PublisherName`为 null，是`True`，程序集名称写入到应用程序清单。If `PublisherName` is null and is `True`, the assembly name is written to the application manifest.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定项目文件中的 属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the property in the project file.

value.span: 与项目文件中 属性相对应的字符串值。

span.span: A string value that corresponds to the property in the project file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性对应于`SupportUrl`项目文件中的属性。This property corresponds to the `SupportUrl` property in the project file. 默认值为 null。The default is null. 如果`SupportUrl`为 null，是`True`，空字符串写入到应用程序清单。If `SupportUrl` is null and is `True`, an empty string is written to the application manifest.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是否将 、 和 属性写入应用程序清单。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the , , and properties are written to the application manifest.

value.span: 一个布尔值，用于指示是否将 、 和 属性写入应用程序清单。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the , , and properties are written to the application manifest.

value.span: 如果该值为 ，则将这些属性写入应用程序清单。

span.span: If the value is , they are written to the application manifest.

value.span: 如果该值为 ，则忽略这些属性。

span.span: If the value is , these properties are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， ，和属性设置为 null。By default, the , , and properties are set to null. 仅当使用它们是`True`。They are used only if is `True`. 如果此属性为`True`，这些属性的值写入到应用程序清单中相应的标记。If this property is `True`, the values of these properties are written to the corresponding tags in the application manifest. 如果是`False`（默认值），则忽略这些属性。If is `False` (the default value), these properties are ignored. 此属性对应于`UseApplicationTrust`项目文件中的属性。This property corresponds to the `UseApplicationTrust` property in the project file.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Validate() cil managed

summary.span: 执行各项检查以验证该清单的有效性。

span.span: Performs various checks to verify the validity of the manifest.

summary.span: 在 对象中报告所有得到的错误或警告。

span.span: Any resulting errors or warnings are reported in the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法之前，必须设置属性，以便验证可以验证是否针对.NET Framework 运行时的正确版本的应用程序清单。Before calling this method, you must set the property so that the validation can verify application manifest against the correct version of the .NET Framework runtime.
